short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See prices in bitcoin, not fiat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bitcoin Price Tag finds dollar-denominated prices on web pages and shows you the equivalent price in bitcoin. 

If you want to see the bitcoin price of goods and services as you browse the Web, Bitcoin Price Tag helps you do just that.

All of the code is open source here:
https://github.com/phrazzld/bitcoin-price-tag
